name: Wonderbox
description:
Wield the Wonderbox to jump, toss, and blast your way through 15 unique levels! Can you get a perfect S rank?

This game will be a little unweildy if you're computer doesn't have a numpad, but I hope those of you who do not will give it a good try anyway!

This game was made for the 25th GM48 game jam with the theme "one tool, many uses." I'd like to thank everyone who tuned into my livestream of the development, even if it was just to say hello! I think this one turned out pretty nice, and I hope you enjoy it!

https://gm48.net/game/813/wonderbox
